name: Potion, Please
description:
Potion, Please!

Game made for "8th official Brackeys Jam"
The game has mechanics from "Papers, Please"

You are the owner of a love potion shop.
The customer gives you a document
containing personal information. 
Given the characteristics of a person,
you need to prepare the right potion.
For successful potions use a book with recipes.
If you make the wrong potion you will lose reputation points.
If the reputation points are 0 - you lose.
Your goal is to make people fall in love with each other and
save up as much money as possible 
to go on a date with girl of your dreams.

Then no one will be alone!
